author: Filmento
description:
Go to https://helixsleep.com/filmento to get a 27% off July sidewide discount.

Thunderbolts brings together second-tier Marvel characters including Yelena Belova, John Walker, Ghost, and Red Guardian. And even though the movie is a big step up, it still flopped badly. The reason being that Marvel seems unable to make big budget blockbusters attracting general audiences the way they used to in the past. So today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's dive into that.

title: Thunderbolts – Why New Marvel Movies Keep Flopping | Anatomy of a Failure
